alert.note: Alert for Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:24PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Miguel and southwestern Montrose Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slick Rock, or 26 miles southeast of La Sal, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Slick Rock. This includes the following highways... Colorado 90 between mile markers 19 and 31. Colorado 141 between mile markers 23 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
